title: Under the Mistletoe
description: Mia Hutchinson, Tara and Ford's daughter from THE SWEETEST THING , has asked her college boyfriend , Nick, to travel to Lucky Harbor for her aunt Maddie's Christmas Eve wedding. Despondent when Nick refuses her invitation, Mia returns home alone and faces her high school sweetheart Carlos Rodriguez for the first time since refusing his marriage proposal. Only to find that he is happily dating someone else.With love and holiday spirit everywhere, Mia wonders who will kiss her this Christmas under the mistletoe.
author: Jill Shalvis
